episode: My most recent past experience where I felt jealous was when my friend and his family went on a European vacation this past December.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: My friend and his family went on a European vacation this past December for Christmas. I couldn't help but feel jealous.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I get that, it sounds like an amazing trip. Maybe you can plan your own adventure soon!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I thought about that, but travel expenses are pretty high right now.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Yeah, it's tough. Maybe a local getaway could be fun?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah, that could be fun. I just never thought I'd find myself jealous of a friend.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's normal to feel that way sometimes.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Really? Can you elaborate?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Sure! It happens to everyone. We all want nice things.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Shouldn't I be happy for my friend instead of jealous?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's okay to feel both!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I suppose. The jealous feelings are making me feel ashamed to be honest.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Don't be too hard on yourself.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah, you're right. Maybe I should look into taking my own Eurotrip.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Great idea! Start planning and saving up.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: What are some cheap options?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Look for budget airlines and hostels.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: What about geographical areas? Are certain places in Europe cheaper than others?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Eastern Europe can be cheaper.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: What is the most touristy part of Eastern Europe?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Prague and Budapest are popular spots!
